1: I trust in my strength to overcome challenges.
2: I seek protection from those who cause trouble.
3: I confidently face challenges with strength and purpose.
4: I am supported and uplifted by those who care.
5: You bring justice and care for all people.
6: I joyfully explore my surroundings, embracing the energy of the night.
7: I speak with confidence, knowing my words are powerful.
8: I find joy as I rise above mockery.
9: I find strength in patiently trusting for my protection.
10: I see my desires fulfilled with divine support.
11: I trust in your strength to guide and protect my people.
12: I embrace truth and integrity in my words.
13: I recognize the divine presence guiding the whole world.
14: In the evening, I joyfully explore the city.
15: I embrace abundance and find joy in what I receive.
16: I sing of your strength and kindness every morning.
17: I sing for joy and feel protected and cherished.
